price: 7. Sekali-kali jangan begitu! Sesungguhnya catatan orang yang durhaka benar-benar tersimpan dalam Sijjīn.*(900)
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ
footnotes: *900). Nama kitab yang mencatat segala perbuatan orang-orang yang durhaka.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
